scripts.copy-files: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); ['config.json','data.txt','proxy.txt','user_agents.json'].forEach(file => { try { fs.copyFileSync(file, path.join('dist', file)); console.log(`Copied ${file} to dist`); } catch(err) { console.error(`Error copying ${file}:`, err); } });"
